Thank's man, this is just great for a drummer like me.
Are these DVD's files from a Mac Computer. I can see them on my PC but I cannot burn a DVD on any burning program. Do I have to convert the MDL and MDS files ?

Is there a good free program ImgBurn. Best of its kind.
Here is the site:http://www.imgburn.com/
It will create an image of the DVD and record it to disc.
It also offers options for the transition point between the layers if the disk is DVD 9.
